title: Acceleration of robot pushing off doll

content.question: A toy doll and a toy robot are standing on a frictionless surface facing each other. The doll has a mass of <math alttext="0.20 kilogram" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>0.20 kg</mtext></mrow></math>, and the robot has a mass of <math alttext="0.30 kilogram" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>0.30 kg</mtext></mrow></math>. The robot pushes on the doll with a force of <math alttext="0.30 newton" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>0.30 N</mtext></mrow></math>. The magnitude of the acceleration of the robot is

choices.label: <math alttext="0.60 meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>0.60 m/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1.0 meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>1.0 m/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1.5 meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>1.5 m/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="1.0 meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>1.0 m/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
